dc_description_s: Relief shown by contours and spot heights.; Surveyed in 1908.; Alternate title: New Mexico (Grant County), Fort Bayard special map.; R.B. Marshall, Chief Geographer. E.C. Barnard, Geographer in charge. Topography and control by Chas. E. Cooke and Stuart T. Penick.; Datum is mean sea level.; Includes responsibility diagram.|80 x 44 Centimeters|Scale 1:12,000|General Map Collection
